snippet: CRONAN--John Barry, 75, died peacefully on May 12, 2016 at home in London. Survived by his loving partner Susanna Allen, children Marcus (Aurelie) and Alexandra, first wife Ulrike, sisters Wren Morgan and Carey Cronan. Services Friday, May 27, 2016, 10:30am at Westminster Cathedral, London. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CRONAN--John Barry, 75, died peacefully on May 12, 2016 at home in London. Survived by his loving partner Susanna Allen, children Marcus (Aurelie) and Alexandra, first wife Ulrike, sisters Wren Morgan and Carey Cronan. Services Friday, May 27, 2016, 10:30am at Westminster Cathedral, London. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CRONAN, JOHN BARRY
